name: 100 Flaps
description:
You have 100 Flaps!

Try to get as high as you can without running out of flaps! Hold the jump button to flap higher or tap it for a quick flap.  You can get more flaps on the way up and also give your self an upgrade every now and then. Try different builds and see which one works for you!  You can also collect coins to unlock more birds!

Controls 

Keyboard or Controller

move :  WASD / arrows

Flap (jump) : Space, K
